net.sf.freecol.common.networking

Class DOMMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.freecol.common.networking.DOMMessage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbandonColonyMessage, AddPlayerMessage, AskSkillMessage, AssignTeacherMessage, AssignTradeRouteMessage, AttackMessage, BuildColonyMessage, BuyMessage, BuyPropositionMessage, CashInTreasureTrainMessage, ChangeStateMessage, ChangeWorkImprovementTypeMessage, ChangeWorkTypeMessage, ChatMessage, ChooseFoundingFatherMessage, ClaimLandMessage, ClearSpecialityMessage, CloseTransactionMessage, DeclareIndependenceMessage, DeclineMoundsMessage, DeleteTradeRouteMessage, DeliverGiftMessage, DemandTributeMessage, DiplomacyMessage, DisbandUnitMessage, DisembarkMessage, EmbarkMessage, EmigrateUnitMessage, EquipForRoleMessage, ErrorMessage, FirstContactMessage, GameStateMessage, GetTransactionMessage, GoodsForSaleMessage, HighScoreMessage, InciteMessage, IndianDemandMessage, JoinColonyMessage, LearnSkillMessage, LoadGoodsMessage, LoginMessage, LootCargoMessage, MissionaryMessage, MonarchActionMessage, MoveMessage, MoveToMessage, MultipleMessage, NationSummaryMessage, NewLandNameMessage, NewRegionNameMessage, NewTradeRouteMessage, PayArrearsMessage, PayForBuildingMessage, PutOutsideColonyMessage, RearrangeColonyMessage, RenameMessage, ScoutIndianSettlementMessage, ScoutSpeakToChiefMessage, SellMessage, SellPropositionMessage, ServerListMessage, SetBuildQueueMessage, SetCurrentStopMessage, SetDestinationMessage, SetGoodsLevelsMessage, SpySettlementMessage, TrainUnitInEuropeMessage, UnloadGoodsMessage, UpdateGameOptionsMessage, UpdateMapGeneratorOptionsMessage, UpdateMessage, UpdateTradeRouteMessage, VacantPlayersMessage, WorkMessage

    public class DOMMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for parsing raw message data into an XML-tree and for creating new XML-trees.

      • DOMMessage

        public DOMMessage(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
           throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                  java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new DOMMessage with data from the given InputStream. The constructor to use if this is an INCOMING message.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The InputStream to get the XML-data from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if thrown by the InputStream.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if thrown during parsing.

        tag - The main tag.
        attributes - Attribute,value pairs.

        public static org.w3c.dom.Element collapseElements(java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> elements)
        Collapses a list of elements into a "multiple" element with the original elements added as child nodes.
        Parameters:
        elements - A list of Elements to collapse.
        Returns:
        A new "multiple" element, or the singleton element of the list, or null if the list is empty.

        public static <T extends FreeColGameObject> T getChild(Game game,
                                                       org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                                                       int index,
                                                       boolean intern,
                                                       java.lang.Class<T> returnClass)
        Convenience method to extract a child element of a particular class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The actual return type.
        Parameters:
        game - The Game to instantiate within.
        element - The parent Element.
        index - The index of the child element.
        intern - Whether to intern the object found.
        returnClass - The expected class of the child.
        Returns:
        A new instance of the return class, or null on error.

        public static java.lang.String readId(org.w3c.dom.Element element)

      • toXMLElement

        public static org.w3c.dom.Element toXMLElement(FreeColObject fco,
                                               org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                                               Player player)
        This method writes an XML-representation of this object to the given stream. Only attributes visible to the given Player will be added to that representation if showAll is set to false.
        Parameters:
        fco - The FreeColObject to write.
        document - The Document.
        player - The Player to send to, or to server if null.
        Returns:
        An XML-representation of this object.

      • toXMLElement

        public static org.w3c.dom.Element toXMLElement(FreeColObject fco,
                                               org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                                               FreeColXMLWriter.WriteScope writeScope)
        This method writes an XML-representation of this object to the given stream. Only attributes visible to the given Player will be added to that representation if showAll is set to false.
        Parameters:
        fco - The FreeColObject to write.
        document - The Document.
        writeScope - The WriteScope to apply.
        Returns:
        An XML-representation of this object.

      • toXMLElementPartial

        public static org.w3c.dom.Element toXMLElementPartial(FreeColObject fco,
                                                      org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                                                      java.lang.String... fields)
        This method writes a partial XML-representation of this object to an element using only the mandatory and specified fields.
        Parameters:
        fco - The FreeColObject to write.
        document - The Document.
        fields - The fields to write.
        Returns:
        An XML-representation of this object.
